description.en: Manga artist Hitoshi Ogino has compiled short comics published mainly in Shogakukan's children's magazines. From the early gag manga of dark history that transcends black history, to the moving story of the middle term. And a wide range of late story works in a style that is almost the same as the present! It is a book that feels the times and growth. Over 400 pages. [Recorded works] Part 1 Dark History Gag Manga ○ Love Attacker Holeta (1995 Separate Volume CoroCoro Comic Special August issue) ○ Psychic Detective Babasuke (1996 Separate Volume CoroCoro Comic Special February issue) ○ Gourmet Warrior Ryo (1996 Separate Volume) CoroCoro Comic Special June issue) ○ Ikeikeike Small Cheering Team! (Separate volume CoroCoro Comic Special February issue, 1997) Part 2 Early Story Manga ○ Wonder Chase Episode 1 (Separate volume CoroCoro Comic Special April issue, 1997) ○ Wonder Chase Episode 2 (Separate volume CoroCoro Comic Special June issue, 1997) ■ Part 3 Story Manga ○ Hokuto Saiyuki Gaiden Episode 1 (1997 Bessatsu CoroCoro Comic Special October issue) ○ Hokuto Saiyuki Gaiden Episode 2 (1997 Bessatsu CoroCoro Comic Special December issue) ○ Hokuto Saiyuki Gaiden Episode 3 ( 1998 Separate CoroCoro Comic Special February issue) ○Hokuto Saiyuki Gaiden Episode 4 (1998 Separate CoroCoro Comic Special April issue) ○ALTO Episode 1 (1999 Hyper CoroCoro Spring issue) ○ALTO Episode 2 (1999 Hyper CoroCoro Summer issue) ○Ancient Giant Xanatos (2006 Precomic BoomBoom March issue) ■Special publication 35th Shogakukan Rookie Comic Awards Children's Division Honorable Mention ○Taro Okamochi! (First honorable mention in 1994)
